aspect: 1. SpaceX launches Falcon 9 rocket carrying cargo spacecraft Dragon to ISS;
2. Landing rocket on floating barge was challenging, but company plans to continue attempts;

explain: SpaceX successfully launches the Falcon 9 rocket carrying the cargo spacecraft Dragon to the International Space Station (ISS).

The aspect highlights the challenges associated with the rocket's landing on a floating barge, but SpaceX remains dedicated to attempting further landings, eventually aiming for successful sea-based landings.

Considering reusing rockets for space travel, it has been estimated that the cost of accessing space could be reduced by a factor of one hundred, significantly reducing the financial burden on space missions.
